description: Listed Building Consent [amended proposal]: For the Manor House, Great Barn, Small Barn and Granary: Repair and maintenance works to install air drain / air dam drainage externally, minor alterations to rainwater goods and lead flashings, repair and maintenance of brickwork, weatherboarding, existing manor windows, and external repointing and repair works.
site_name: Harrow Museum And Heritage Centre, Headstone Manor
decision_conditions:
<p><span style="line-height: 107%;">All new external and internal works and finishes and works of making
good to the retained fabric shall match the existing adjacent work with regard
to the methods used and materials, colour, texture and profile, unless shown
otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved or required by
any conditions(s) attached to this consent.<br></span><br></p>
